Reference

All functions

RoBSA-package _PACKAGE RoBSA_package RoBSA.package

RoBSA: Robust Bayesian survival analysis

RoBSA()

Fit Robust Bayesian Survival Analysis

set_autofit_control() set_convergence_checks()

Control MCMC fitting process

RoBSA.options() RoBSA.get_option()

Options for the RoBSA package

calibrate_meta_analytic()

Create meta-analytic predictive prior distributions

calibrate_quartiles()

Calibrate prior distributions based on quartiles

check_RoBSA()

Check fitted RoBSA object for errors and warnings

check_setup()

Prints summary of "RoBSA" corresponding to the input

contr.orthonormal()

Orthornomal contrast matrix

get_default_prior_beta_null() get_default_prior_beta_alt() get_default_prior_factor_null() get_default_prior_factor_alt() get_default_prior_intercept() get_default_prior_aux()

Default prior distributions

diagnostics() diagnostics_autocorrelation() diagnostics_trace() diagnostics_density()

Visualizes MCMC diagnostics for a fitted RoBSA object

exp_aft_log_density() exp_aft_log_hazard() exp_aft_log_survival() exp_aft_density() exp_aft_hazard() exp_aft_survival() exp_aft_mean() exp_aft_sd() exp_aft_r() exp_aft_q() exp_aft_p()

Exponential AFT parametric family.

extract_flexsurv()

Extract parameter estimates from flexsurv object

gamma_aft_log_density() gamma_aft_log_hazard() gamma_aft_log_survival() gamma_aft_density() gamma_aft_hazard() gamma_aft_survival() gamma_aft_mean() gamma_aft_sd() gamma_aft_r() gamma_aft_q() gamma_aft_p()

Gamma AFT parametric family.

is.RoBSA()

Reports whether x is a RoBSA object

llogis_aft_log_density() llogis_aft_log_hazard() llogis_aft_log_survival() llogis_aft_density() llogis_aft_hazard() llogis_aft_survival() llogis_aft_mean() llogis_aft_sd() llogis_aft_r() llogis_aft_q() llogis_aft_p()

Log-logistic AFT parametric family.

lnorm_aft_log_density() lnorm_aft_log_hazard() lnorm_aft_log_survival() lnorm_aft_density() lnorm_aft_hazard() lnorm_aft_survival() lnorm_aft_mean() lnorm_aft_sd() lnorm_aft_r() lnorm_aft_q() lnorm_aft_p()

Log-normal AFT parametric family.

plot(<RoBSA>)

Plots a fitted RoBSA object

plot_models()

Models plot for a RoBSA object

plot_prediction() plot_survival() plot_hazard() plot_density()

Survival plots for a RoBSA object

predict(<RoBSA>)

Predict method for RoBSA objects.

print(<RoBSA>)

Prints a fitted RoBSA object

print(<summary.RoBSA>)

Prints summary object for RoBSA method

prior()

Creates a prior distribution

prior_factor()

Creates a prior distribution for factors

prior_informed()

Creates an informed prior distribution based on research

prior_informed_medicine_names

Names of medical subfields from the Cochrane database of systematic reviews

prior_none()

Creates a prior distribution

summary(<RoBSA>)

Summarize fitted RoBSA object

update(<RoBSA>)

Updates a fitted RoBSA object

weibull_aft_log_density() weibull_aft_log_hazard() weibull_aft_log_survival() weibull_aft_density() weibull_aft_hazard() weibull_aft_survival() weibull_aft_mean() weibull_aft_sd() weibull_aft_r() weibull_aft_q() weibull_aft_p()

Weibull AFT parametric family.
